ygData.subject: Re: Erudite?
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to http://everquest.gamestats.com and check there for a list of many many quests, also there are links there to other pages with more quests. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Go to http://everquest.gamestats.com and check there for a list of many many
quests, also there are links there to other pages with more quests.

----- Original Message -----
From: Phillip Ratliff <p_ratliff@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 1999 2:32 PM
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Erudite?


: From: Phillip Ratliff <p_ratliff@...>
:
: Are there any good quests for a wiz to do? For items,
: stuff...? Or just a Erudite quest that might be
: worthwhile? I heard Stein of Moggok is only Enchanter
: quest, are there any only Wizard ones? Please tell!
:
: Kalavarin-Wizard of Solusek Ro
: Erollisi Marr
